   20: 
   21: -module(global_group_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   24: 	 init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   25: -export([start_gg_proc/1, no_gg_proc/1, no_gg_proc_sync/1, compatible/1, 
   26: 	 one_grp/1, one_grp_x/1, two_grp/1, hidden_groups/1, test_exit/1,
   27:          global_disconnect/1]).
   28: -export([init/1, init/2, init2/2, start_proc/1, start_proc_rereg/1]).
   29: 
   30: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   31: 
   32: %%-compile(export_all).
   33: 
   34: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   35: 
   36: -define(NODES, [node()|nodes()]).
   37: 
   38: -define(UNTIL(Seq), loop_until_true(fun() -> Seq end)).
   39: 
   40: suite() ->
   41:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   42:      {timetrap,{minutes,5}}].
   43: 
   44: all() -> 
   45:     [start_gg_proc, no_gg_proc, no_gg_proc_sync, compatible,
   46:      one_grp, one_grp_x, two_grp, test_exit, hidden_groups,
   47:      global_disconnect].
   48: 
   49: groups() -> 
   50:     [].
   51: 
   52: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   53:     Config.
   54: 
   55: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   56:     Config.
   57: 
   58: 
   59: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   60:     %% Copied from test_server_ctrl ln 647, we have to do this here as
   61:     %% the test_server only does this when run without common_test
   62:     global:sync(),
   63:     case global:whereis_name(test_server) of
   64: 	undefined ->
   65: 	    io:format(user, "Registering test_server globally!~n",[]),
   66: 	    global:register_name(test_server, whereis(test_server_ctrl));
   67: 	Pid ->
   68: 	    case node() of
   69: 		N when N == node(Pid) ->
   70: 		    io:format(user, "Warning: test_server already running!\n", []),
   71: 		    global:re_register_name(test_server,self());
   72: 		_ ->
   73: 		    ok
   74: 	    end
   75:     end,
   76:     Config.
   77: 
   78: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   79:     global:unregister_name(test_server),
   80:     ok.
   81: 
   82: -define(TESTCASE, testcase_name).
   83: -define(testcase, proplists:get_value(?TESTCASE, Config)).
   84: 
   85: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   86:     Config.
   87: 
   88: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   89:     ok.
   90: 
   91: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   92: %% Test suites for global groups.
   93: %% Should be started in a CC view with:
   94: %% erl -sname XXX -rsh ctrsh where XXX not in [cp1 .. cpN]
   95: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   96: 
   97: 
   98: %% Check that the global_group processes are started automatically. .
   99: start_gg_proc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  100:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  101:     File = filename:join(Dir, "global_group.config"),
  102:     {ok, Fd}=file:open(File, [write]),
  103:     [Ncp1,Ncp2,Ncp3] = [?CT_PEER_NAME() || _ <- [cp1, cp2, cp3]],
  104:     config(Fd, Ncp1, Ncp2, Ncp3, "cpx", "cpy", "cpz", "cpq"),
  105: 
  106:     Args = ["-config", filename:join(Dir, "global_group")],
  107: 
  108:     {ok, Peer1, Cp1} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncp1, args => Args}),
  109:     {ok, Peer2, Cp2} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncp2, args => Args}),
  110:     {ok, Peer3, Cp3} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncp3, args => Args}),
  111: 
  112:     [] = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp1}]),
  113:     [] = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp2}]),
  114:     [] = rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp3}]),
  115: 
  116:     %% stop the nodes, and make sure names are released.
  117:     peer:stop(Peer1),
  118:     peer:stop(Peer2),
  119:     peer:stop(Peer3),
  120: 
  121:     ?UNTIL(undefined =:= global:whereis_name(test)),
  122:     ok.
  123: 
  124: 
  125: 
  126: %% Start a system without global groups. Nodes are not
  127: %% synced at start (sync_nodes_optional is not defined).
  128: no_gg_proc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  129:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  130:     File = filename:join(Dir, "no_global_group.config"),
  131:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [write]),
  132:     config_no(Fd),
  133: 
  134:     Args = ["-config", filename:join(Dir, "no_global_group")],
  135:     {ok, Peer1, Cp1} = ?CT_PEER(#{args => Args}),
  136:     {ok, Peer2, Cp2} = ?CT_PEER(#{args => Args}),
  137:     {ok, Peer3, Cp3} = ?CT_PEER(#{args => Args}),
  138:     {ok, Peerx, Cpx} = ?CT_PEER(#{args => Args}),
  139:     {ok, Peery, Cpy} = ?CT_PEER(#{args => Args}),
  140:     {ok, Peerz, Cpz} = ?CT_PEER(#{args => Args}),
  141: 
  142:     %% let the nodes know of each other
  143:     pong = rpc:call(Cp1, net_adm, ping, [Cp2]),
  144:     pong = rpc:call(Cp2, net_adm, ping, [Cp3]),
  145:     pong = rpc:call(Cp3, net_adm, ping, [Cpx]),
  146:     pong = rpc:call(Cpx, net_adm, ping, [Cpy]),
  147:     pong = rpc:call(Cpy, net_adm, ping, [Cpz]),
  148: 
  149:     wait_for_ready_net(),
  150: 
  151:     [test_server] = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp1}]),
  152:     [test_server] = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp2}]),
  153:     [test_server] = rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp3}]),
  154:     [test_server] = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cpx}]),
  155:     [test_server] = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cpy}]),
  156:     [test_server] = rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cpz}]),
  157: 
  158: 
  159:     %% start a proc and register it
  160:     {Pid2, yes} = rpc:call(Cp2, ?MODULE, start_proc, [test2]),
  161: 
  162:     RegNames = lists:sort([test2,test_server]),
  163: 
  164:     RegNames =
  165: 	lists:sort(
  166: 	  rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp1}])),
  167:     RegNames =
  168: 	lists:sort(
  169: 	  rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp2}])),
  170:     RegNames =
  171: 	lists:sort(
  172: 	  rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp3}])),
  173:     RegNames =
  174: 	lists:sort(
  175: 	  rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cpx}])),
  176:     RegNames =
  177: 	lists:sort(
  178: 	  rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cpy}])),
  179:     RegNames =
  180: 	lists:sort(
  181: 	  rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cpz}])),
  182: 
  183: 
  184:     undefined = rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, global_groups, []),
  185: 
  186:     Own_nodes_should = [node(), Cp1, Cp2, Cp3,
  187: 			Cpx, Cpy, Cpz],
  188:     Own_nodes = rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, own_nodes, []),
  189:     [] = (Own_nodes -- Own_nodes_should),
  190:     [] = (Own_nodes_should -- Own_nodes),
  191: 
  192:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, send, [test2, {ping, self()}]),
  193:     receive
  194: 	{pong, Cp2} -> ok
  195:     after
  196: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout2)
  197:     end,
  198:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [test2, {ping, self()}]),
  199:     receive
  200: 	{pong, Cp2} -> ok
  201:     after
  202: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout3)
  203:     end,
  204:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cpz, global_group, send, [test2, {ping, self()}]),
  205:     receive
  206: 	{pong, Cp2} -> ok
  207:     after
  208: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout4)
  209:     end,
  210: 
  211: 
  212:     %% start a proc and register it
  213:     {PidX, yes} = rpc:call(Cpx, ?MODULE, start_proc, [test]),
  214: 
  215: 
  216:     %%------------------------------------
  217:     %% Test monitor nodes
  218:     %%------------------------------------
  219:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2, monitor]),
  220:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test, monitor]),
  221: 
  222: 
  223:     %% Kill node Cp1
  224:     Pid2 =
  225: 	rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2, {wait_nodedown, Cp1}]),
  226:     PidX =
  227: 	rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test, {wait_nodedown, Cp1}]),
  228:     ct:sleep(100),
  229:     peer:stop(Peer1),
  230:     ct:sleep(1000),
  231: 
  232:     ok = assert_loop(Cp2, Cp2, test2, Pid2, loop),
  233:     ok = assert_loop(Cpx, Cpx, test, PidX, loop),
  234: 
  235:     %% Kill node Cpz
  236:     Pid2 =
  237: 	rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2, {wait_nodedown, Cpz}]),
  238:     PidX =
  239: 	rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test, {wait_nodedown, Cpz}]),
  240:     ct:sleep(100),
  241:     peer:stop(Peerz),
  242:     ct:sleep(1000),
  243: 
  244:     ok = assert_loop(Cp2, Cp2, test2, Pid2, loop),
  245:     ok = assert_loop(Cpx, Cpx, test, PidX, loop),
  246: 
  247:     %% Restart node Cp1
  248:     Pid2 =
  249: 	rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2, {wait_nodeup, Cp1}]),
  250:     PidX =
  251: 	rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test, {wait_nodeup, Cp1}]),
  252:     {ok, Peer11, Cp1} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Cp1, args => Args}),
  253:     pong = rpc:call(Cp2, net_adm, ping, [Cp1]),
  254:     pong = rpc:call(Cpx, net_adm, ping, [Cp1]),
  255:     wait_for_ready_net(),
  256: 
  257:     ok = assert_loop(Cp2, Cp2, test2, Pid2, loop),
  258:     ok = assert_loop(Cpx, Cpx, test, PidX, loop),
  259: 
  260:     %% Restart node Cpz
  261:     Pid2 =
  262: 	rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2, {wait_nodeup, Cpz}]),
  263:     PidX =
  264: 	rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test, {wait_nodeup, Cpz}]),
  265:     {ok, Peer1z, Cpz} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Cpz, args => Args}),
  266:     pong = rpc:call(Cp2, net_adm, ping, [Cpz]),
  267:     pong = rpc:call(Cpx, net_adm, ping, [Cpz]),
  268:     wait_for_ready_net(),
  269: 
  270:     ok = assert_loop(Cp2, Cp2, test2, Pid2, loop),
  271:     ok = assert_loop(Cpx, Cpx, test, PidX, loop),
  272: 
  273:     %% stop the nodes, and make sure names are released.
  274:     peer:stop(Peer11),
  275:     peer:stop(Peer2),
  276:     peer:stop(Peer3),
  277:     peer:stop(Peerx),
  278:     peer:stop(Peery),
  279:     peer:stop(Peer1z),
  280: 
  281:     ?UNTIL(undefined =:= global:whereis_name(test)),
  282:     ok.
  283: 
  284: 
  285: 
  286: 
  287: %% Start a system without global groups, but syncing the nodes by using
  288: %% sync_nodes_optional.
  289: no_gg_proc_sync(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  290:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  291:     File = filename:join(Dir, "no_global_group_sync.config"),
  292:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [write]),
  293: 
  294:     [Ncp1,Ncp2,Ncp3,Ncpx,Ncpy,Ncpz] = [?CT_PEER_NAME() ||
  295:         _ <- [cp1,cp2,cp3,cpx,cpy,cpz]],
  296:     config_sync(Fd, Ncp1, Ncp2, Ncp3, Ncpx, Ncpy, Ncpz),
  297: 
  298:     Args = ["-config", filename:join(Dir, "no_global_group_sync")],
  299:     {ok, Peer1, Cp1} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncp1, args => Args}),
  300:     {ok, Peer2, Cp2} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncp2, args => Args}),
  301:     {ok, Peer3, Cp3} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncp3, args => Args}),
  302:     {ok, Peerx, Cpx} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncpx, args => Args}),
  303:     {ok, Peery, Cpy} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncpy, args => Args}),
  304:     {ok, Peerz, Cpz} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncpz, args => Args}),
  305: 
  306:     %% let the nodes know of each other
  307:     pong = rpc:call(Cp1, net_adm, ping, [Cp2]),
  308:     pong = rpc:call(Cp2, net_adm, ping, [Cp3]),
  309:     pong = rpc:call(Cp3, net_adm, ping, [Cpx]),
  310:     pong = rpc:call(Cpx, net_adm, ping, [Cpy]),
  311:     pong = rpc:call(Cpy, net_adm, ping, [Cpz]),
  312: 
  313:     wait_for_ready_net(),
  314: 
  315:     [test_server] = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp1}]),
  316:     [test_server] = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp2}]),
  317:     [test_server] = rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp3}]),
  318:     [test_server] = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cpx}]),
  319:     [test_server] = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cpy}]),
  320:     [test_server] = rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cpz}]),
  321: 
  322: 
  323:     %% start a proc and register it
  324:     {Pid2, yes} = rpc:call(Cp2, ?MODULE, start_proc, [test2]),
  325: 
  326:     RegNames = lists:sort([test2,test_server]),
  327: 
  328:     RegNames =
  329: 	lists:sort(
  330: 	  rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp1}])),
  331:     RegNames =
  332: 	lists:sort(
  333: 	  rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp2}])),
  334:     RegNames =
  335: 	lists:sort(
  336: 	  rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp3}])),
  337:     RegNames =
  338: 	lists:sort(
  339: 	  rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cpx}])),
  340:     RegNames =
  341: 	lists:sort(
  342: 	  rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cpy}])),
  343:     RegNames =
  344: 	lists:sort(
  345: 	  rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cpz}])),
  346: 
  347: 
  348:     undefined = rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, global_groups, []),
  349: 
  350:     Own_nodes_should = [node(), Cp1, Cp2, Cp3,
  351: 			Cpx, Cpy, Cpz],
  352:     Own_nodes = rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, own_nodes, []),
  353:     [] = (Own_nodes -- Own_nodes_should),
  354:     [] = (Own_nodes_should -- Own_nodes),
  355: 
  356:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, send, [test2, {ping, self()}]),
  357:     receive
  358: 	{pong, Cp2} -> ok
  359:     after
  360: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout2)
  361:     end,
  362:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [test2, {ping, self()}]),
  363:     receive
  364: 	{pong, Cp2} -> ok
  365:     after
  366: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout3)
  367:     end,
  368:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cpz, global_group, send, [test2, {ping, self()}]),
  369:     receive
  370: 	{pong, Cp2} -> ok
  371:     after
  372: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout4)
  373:     end,
  374: 
  375: 
  376:     %% start a proc and register it
  377:     {PidX, yes} = rpc:call(Cpx, ?MODULE, start_proc, [test]),
  378: 
  379: 
  380:     %%------------------------------------
  381:     %% Test monitor nodes
  382:     %%------------------------------------
  383:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2, monitor]),
  384:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test, monitor]),
  385: 
  386: 
  387:     %% Kill node Cp1
  388:     Pid2 =
  389: 	rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2, {wait_nodedown, Cp1}]),
  390:     PidX =
  391: 	rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test, {wait_nodedown, Cp1}]),
  392:     ct:sleep(100),
  393:     peer:stop(Peer1),
  394:     ct:sleep(1000),
  395: 
  396:     ok = assert_loop(Cp2, Cp2, test2, Pid2, loop),
  397:     ok = assert_loop(Cpx, Cpx, test, PidX, loop),
  398: 
  399:     %% Kill node Cpz
  400:     Pid2 =
  401: 	rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2, {wait_nodedown, Cpz}]),
  402:     PidX =
  403: 	rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test, {wait_nodedown, Cpz}]),
  404:     ct:sleep(100),
  405:     peer:stop(Peerz),
  406:     ct:sleep(1000),
  407: 
  408:     ok = assert_loop(Cp2, Cp2, test2, Pid2, loop),
  409:     ok = assert_loop(Cpx, Cpx, test, PidX, loop),
  410: 
  411:     %% Restart node Cp1
  412:     Pid2 =
  413: 	rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2, {wait_nodeup, Cp1}]),
  414:     PidX =
  415: 	rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test, {wait_nodeup, Cp1}]),
  416:     {ok, Peer11, Cp1} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Cp1, args => Args}),
  417:     pong = rpc:call(Cp2, net_adm, ping, [Cp1]),
  418:     pong = rpc:call(Cpx, net_adm, ping, [Cp1]),
  419:     wait_for_ready_net(),
  420: 
  421:     ok = assert_loop(Cp2, Cp2, test2, Pid2, loop),
  422:     ok = assert_loop(Cpx, Cpx, test, PidX, loop),
  423: 
  424:     %% Restart node Cpz
  425:     Pid2 =
  426: 	rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2, {wait_nodeup, Cpz}]),
  427:     PidX =
  428: 	rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test, {wait_nodeup, Cpz}]),
  429:     {ok, Peerz1, Cpz} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Cpz, args => Args}),
  430:     pong = rpc:call(Cp2, net_adm, ping, [Cpz]),
  431:     pong = rpc:call(Cpx, net_adm, ping, [Cpz]),
  432:     wait_for_ready_net(),
  433: 
  434:     ok = assert_loop(Cp2, Cp2, test2, Pid2, loop),
  435:     ok = assert_loop(Cpx, Cpx, test, PidX, loop),
  436: 
  437:     %% stop the nodes, and make sure names are released.
  438:     peer:stop(Peer11),
  439:     peer:stop(Peer2),
  440:     peer:stop(Peer3),
  441:     peer:stop(Peerx),
  442:     peer:stop(Peery),
  443:     peer:stop(Peerz1),
  444: 
  445:     ?UNTIL(undefined =:= global:whereis_name(test)),
  446:     ok.
  447: 
  448: 
  449: 
  450: 
  451: %% Check that a system without global groups is compatible with the old R4 system.
  452: compatible(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  453:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  454:     File = filename:join(Dir, "global_group_comp.config"),
  455:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [write]),
  456: 
  457:     [Ncp1,Ncp2,Ncp3,Ncpx,Ncpy,Ncpz] = [?CT_PEER_NAME() ||
  458:         _ <- [cp1,cp2,cp3,cpx,cpy,cpz]],
  459:     config_sync(Fd, Ncp1, Ncp2, Ncp3, Ncpx, Ncpy, Ncpz),
  460: 
  461:     Args = ["-config", filename:join(Dir, "global_group_comp")],
  462:     {ok, Peer1, Cp1} = ?CT_PEER(#{args => Args}),
  463:     {ok, Peer2, Cp2} = ?CT_PEER(#{args => Args}),
  464:     {ok, Peer3, Cp3} = ?CT_PEER(#{args => Args}),
  465:     {ok, Peerx, Cpx} = ?CT_PEER(#{args => Args}),
  466:     {ok, Peery, Cpy} = ?CT_PEER(#{args => Args}),
  467:     {ok, Peerz, Cpz} = ?CT_PEER(#{args => Args}),
  468: 
  469:     %% let the nodes know of each other
  470:     pong = rpc:call(Cp1, net_adm, ping, [Cp2]),
  471:     pong = rpc:call(Cp2, net_adm, ping, [Cp3]),
  472:     pong = rpc:call(Cp3, net_adm, ping, [Cpx]),
  473:     pong = rpc:call(Cpx, net_adm, ping, [Cpy]),
  474:     pong = rpc:call(Cpy, net_adm, ping, [Cpz]),
  475: 
  476:     wait_for_ready_net(),
  477: 
  478:     [test_server] = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp1}]),
  479:     [test_server] = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp2}]),
  480:     [test_server] = rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp3}]),
  481:     [test_server] = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cpx}]),
  482:     [test_server] = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cpy}]),
  483:     [test_server] = rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cpz}]),
  484: 
  485: 
  486:     %% start a proc and register it
  487:     {Pid2, yes} = rpc:call(Cp2, ?MODULE, start_proc, [test2]),
  488: 
  489:     RegNames = lists:sort([test2,test_server]),
  490: 
  491:     RegNames =
  492: 	lists:sort(
  493: 	  rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp1}])),
  494:     RegNames =
  495: 	lists:sort(
  496: 	  rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp2}])),
  497:     RegNames =
  498: 	lists:sort(
  499: 	  rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp3}])),
  500:     RegNames =
  501: 	lists:sort(
  502: 	  rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cpx}])),
  503:     RegNames =
  504: 	lists:sort(
  505: 	  rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cpy}])),
  506:     RegNames =
  507: 	lists:sort(
  508: 	  rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cpz}])),
  509: 
  510: 
  511:     undefined = rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, global_groups, []),
  512: 
  513:     Own_nodes_should = [node(), Cp1, Cp2, Cp3,
  514: 			Cpx, Cpy, Cpz],
  515:     Own_nodes = rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, own_nodes, []),
  516:     [] = (Own_nodes -- Own_nodes_should),
  517:     [] = (Own_nodes_should -- Own_nodes),
  518: 
  519:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, send, [test2, {ping, self()}]),
  520:     receive
  521: 	{pong, Cp2} -> ok
  522:     after
  523: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout2)
  524:     end,
  525:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [test2, {ping, self()}]),
  526:     receive
  527: 	{pong, Cp2} -> ok
  528:     after
  529: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout3)
  530:     end,
  531:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cpz, global_group, send, [test2, {ping, self()}]),
  532:     receive
  533: 	{pong, Cp2} -> ok
  534:     after
  535: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout4)
  536:     end,
  537: 
  538: 
  539:     %% start a proc and register it
  540:     {PidX, yes} = rpc:call(Cpx, ?MODULE, start_proc, [test]),
  541: 
  542: 
  543:     %%------------------------------------
  544:     %% Test monitor nodes
  545:     %%------------------------------------
  546:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2, monitor]),
  547:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test, monitor]),
  548: 
  549: 
  550:     %% Kill node Cp1
  551:     Pid2 =
  552: 	rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2, {wait_nodedown, Cp1}]),
  553:     PidX =
  554: 	rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test, {wait_nodedown, Cp1}]),
  555:     ct:sleep(100),
  556:     peer:stop(Peer1),
  557:     ct:sleep(1000),
  558: 
  559:     ok = assert_loop(Cp2, Cp2, test2, Pid2, loop),
  560:     ok = assert_loop(Cpx, Cpx, test, PidX, loop),
  561: 
  562:     %% Kill node Cpz
  563:     Pid2 =
  564: 	rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2, {wait_nodedown, Cpz}]),
  565:     PidX =
  566: 	rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test, {wait_nodedown, Cpz}]),
  567:     ct:sleep(100),
  568:     peer:stop(Peerz),
  569:     ct:sleep(1000),
  570: 
  571:     ok = assert_loop(Cp2, Cp2, test2, Pid2, loop),
  572:     ok = assert_loop(Cpx, Cpx, test, PidX, loop),
  573: 
  574:     %% Restart node Cp1
  575:     Pid2 =
  576: 	rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2, {wait_nodeup, Cp1}]),
  577:     PidX =
  578: 	rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test, {wait_nodeup, Cp1}]),
  579:     {ok, Peer11, Cp1} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Cp1, args => Args}),
  580:     pong = rpc:call(Cp2, net_adm, ping, [Cp1]),
  581:     pong = rpc:call(Cpx, net_adm, ping, [Cp1]),
  582:     wait_for_ready_net(),
  583: 
  584:     ok = assert_loop(Cp2, Cp2, test2, Pid2, loop),
  585:     ok = assert_loop(Cpx, Cpx, test, PidX, loop),
  586: 
  587:     %% Restart node Cpz
  588:     Pid2 =
  589: 	rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2, {wait_nodeup, Cpz}]),
  590:     PidX =
  591: 	rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test, {wait_nodeup, Cpz}]),
  592:     {ok, Peer1z, Cpz} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Cpz, args => Args}),
  593:     pong = rpc:call(Cp2, net_adm, ping, [Cpz]),
  594:     pong = rpc:call(Cpx, net_adm, ping, [Cpz]),
  595:     wait_for_ready_net(),
  596: 
  597:     ok = assert_loop(Cp2, Cp2, test2, Pid2, loop),
  598:     ok = assert_loop(Cpx, Cpx, test, PidX, loop),
  599: 
  600:     %% stop the nodes, and make sure names are released.
  601:     peer:stop(Peer11),
  602:     peer:stop(Peer2),
  603:     peer:stop(Peer3),
  604:     peer:stop(Peerx),
  605:     peer:stop(Peery),
  606:     peer:stop(Peer1z),
  607: 
  608:     ?UNTIL(undefined =:= global:whereis_name(test)),
  609:     ok.
  610: 
  611: 
  612: 
  613: 
  614: %% Test a system with only one global group. .
  615: one_grp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  616:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  617:     File = filename:join(Dir, "global_group.config"),
  618:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [write]),
  619:     [Ncp1,Ncp2,Ncp3] = [?CT_PEER_NAME() || _ <- [cp1, cp2, cp3]],
  620:     config(Fd, Ncp1, Ncp2, Ncp3, "cpx", "cpy", "cpz", "cpq"),
  621: 
  622:     Args = ["-config", filename:join(Dir, "global_group")],
  623:     {ok, Peer1, Cp1} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncp1, args => Args}),
  624:     {ok, Peer2, Cp2} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncp2, args => Args}),
  625:     {ok, Peer3, Cp3} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncp3, args => Args}),
  626: 
  627:     %% sleep a while to make the global_group to sync...
  628:     ct:sleep(1000),
  629: 
  630:     %% start a proc and register it
  631:     {Pid, yes} = rpc:call(Cp1, ?MODULE, start_proc, [test]),
  632: 
  633:     %% test that it is registered at all nodes
  634:     Pid = rpc:call(Cp1, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  635:     Pid = rpc:call(Cp2, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  636:     Pid = rpc:call(Cp3, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  637:     
  638:     %% try to register the same name
  639:     no = rpc:call(Cp1, global, register_name, [test, self()]),
  640:     
  641:     %% let process exit, check that it is unregistered automatically
  642:     Pid ! die,
  643:         ?UNTIL(begin
  644:                (undefined =:= rpc:call(Cp1, global, whereis_name, [test])) and
  645:                (undefined =:= rpc:call(Cp2, global, whereis_name, [test])) and
  646:                (undefined =:= rpc:call(Cp3, global, whereis_name, [test]))
  647:            end),
  648:     
  649:     %% test re_register
  650:     {Pid2, yes} = rpc:call(Cp1, ?MODULE, start_proc, [test]),
  651:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp3, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  652:     Pid3 = rpc:call(Cp3, ?MODULE, start_proc_rereg, [test]),
  653:     Pid3 = rpc:call(Cp3, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  654: 
  655:     %% test sending
  656:     rpc:call(Cp1, global, send, [test, {ping, self()}]),
  657:     receive
  658: 	{pong, Cp3} -> ok
  659:     after
  660: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout1)
  661:     end,
  662: 
  663:     rpc:call(Cp3, global, send, [test, {ping, self()}]),
  664:     receive
  665: 	{pong, Cp3} -> ok
  666:     after
  667: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout2)
  668:     end,
  669: 
  670:     rpc:call(Cp3, global, unregister_name, [test]),
  671:     undefined = rpc:call(Cp1, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  672:     undefined = rpc:call(Cp2, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  673:     undefined = rpc:call(Cp3, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  674: 
  675:     Pid3 ! die,
  676:     ?UNTIL(undefined =:= rpc:call(Cp3, global, whereis_name, [test])),
  677: 
  678:     %% register a proc
  679:     {_, yes} = rpc:call(Cp3, ?MODULE, start_proc, [test]),
  680: 
  681:     %% stop the nodes, and make sure names are released.
  682:     peer:stop(Peer3),
  683: 
  684:     ?UNTIL(undefined =:= rpc:call(Cp1, global, whereis_name, [test])),
  685:     Pid2 ! die,
  686: 
  687:     peer:stop(Peer1),
  688:     peer:stop(Peer2),
  689: 
  690:     ok.
  691: 
  692: 
  693: 
  694: 
  695: 
  696: %% Check a system with only one global group.
  697: %% Start the nodes with different time intervals.
  698: one_grp_x(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  699:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  700:     File = filename:join(Dir, "global_group.config"),
  701:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [write]),
  702:     [Ncp1,Ncp2,Ncp3] = [?CT_PEER_NAME() || _ <- [cp1, cp2, cp3]],
  703:     config(Fd, Ncp1, Ncp2, Ncp3, "cpx", "cpy", "cpz", "cpq"),
  704: 
  705:     Args = ["-config", filename:join(Dir, "global_group")],
  706:     {ok, Peer1, Cp1} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncp1, args => Args}),
  707:     %% sleep a while to make the global_group to sync...
  708:     ct:sleep(1000),
  709: 
  710:     %% start a proc and register it
  711:     {Pid, yes} = rpc:call(Cp1, ?MODULE, start_proc, [test]),
  712: 
  713:     {ok, Peer2, Cp2} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncp2, args => Args}),
  714:     %% sleep a while to make the global_group to sync...
  715:     ct:sleep(1000),
  716: 
  717:     %% test that it is registered at all nodes
  718:     Pid = rpc:call(Cp1, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  719:     Pid = rpc:call(Cp2, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  720: 
  721:     {ok, Peer3, Cp3} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncp3, args => Args}),
  722:     %% sleep a while to make the global_group to sync...
  723:     ct:sleep(1000),
  724: 
  725:     Pid = rpc:call(Cp3, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  726:     
  727:     %% try to register the same name
  728:     no = rpc:call(Cp1, global, register_name, [test, self()]),
  729:     
  730:     %% let process exit, check that it is unregistered automatically
  731:     Pid ! die,
  732:         ?UNTIL(begin
  733:                (undefined =:= rpc:call(Cp1, global, whereis_name, [test])) and
  734:                (undefined =:= rpc:call(Cp2, global, whereis_name, [test])) and
  735:                (undefined =:= rpc:call(Cp3, global, whereis_name, [test]))
  736:            end),
  737:     
  738:     %% test re_register
  739:     {Pid2, yes} = rpc:call(Cp1, ?MODULE, start_proc, [test]),
  740:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp3, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  741: 
  742:     Pid2 ! die,
  743: 
  744:     peer:stop(Peer1),
  745:     peer:stop(Peer2),
  746:     peer:stop(Peer3),
  747: 
  748:     ok.
  749: 
  750: 
  751: 
  752: 
  753: 
  754: 
  755: %% Test a two global group system. .
  756: two_grp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  757:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  758:     File = filename:join(Dir, "global_group.config"),
  759:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [write]),
  760: 
  761:     [Ncp1,Ncp2,Ncp3,Ncpx,Ncpy,Ncpz,Ncpq] = [?CT_PEER_NAME() ||
  762:         _ <- [cp1,cp2,cp3,cpx,cpy,cpz,cpq]],
  763:     config(Fd, Ncp1, Ncp2, Ncp3, Ncpx, Ncpy, Ncpz, Ncpq),
  764: 
  765:     Args = ["-config", filename:join(Dir, "global_group")],
  766:     {ok, Peer1, Cp1} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncp1, args => Args}),
  767:     {ok, Peer2, Cp2} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncp2, args => Args}),
  768:     {ok, Peer3, Cp3} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncp3, args => Args}),
  769:     {ok, Peerx, Cpx} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncpx, args => Args}),
  770:     {ok, Peery, Cpy} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncpy, args => Args}),
  771:     {ok, Peerz, Cpz} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncpz, args => Args}),
  772: 
  773:     %% The groups (cpq not started):
  774:     %% [{nc1, [cp1,cp2,cp3]}, {nc2, [cpx,cpy,cpz]}, {nc3, [cpq]}]
  775: 
  776:     %% sleep a while to make the global_groups to sync...
  777:     ct:sleep(1000),
  778: 
  779:     %% check the global group names
  780:     {nc1, [nc2, nc3]} = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, global_groups, []),
  781:     {nc1, [nc2, nc3]} = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, global_groups, []),
  782:     {nc1, [nc2, nc3]} = rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, global_groups, []),
  783:     {nc2, [nc1, nc3]} = rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, global_groups, []),
  784:     {nc2, [nc1, nc3]} = rpc:call(Cpy, global_group, global_groups, []),
  785:     {nc2, [nc1, nc3]} = rpc:call(Cpz, global_group, global_groups, []),
  786: 
  787:     %% check the global group nodes
  788:     Nodes1 = lists:sort([Cp1, Cp2, Cp3]),
  789:     Nodes2 = lists:sort([Cpx, Cpy, Cpz]),
  790:     Nodes1 = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, own_nodes, []),
  791:     Nodes1 = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, own_nodes, []),
  792:     Nodes1 = rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, own_nodes, []),
  793:     Nodes2 = rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, own_nodes, []),
  794:     Nodes2 = rpc:call(Cpy, global_group, own_nodes, []),
  795:     Nodes2 = rpc:call(Cpz, global_group, own_nodes, []),
  796: 
  797: 
  798:     %% start a proc and register it
  799:     {Pid1, yes} = rpc:call(Cp1, ?MODULE, start_proc, [test]),
  800: 
  801:     Pid1 = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, send, [test, {io, from_cp1}]),
  802:     Pid1 = rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [test, {io, from_cpx}]),
  803:     Pid1 = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, send, [{group,nc1}, test,
  804: 					      {io, from_cp1}]),
  805:     [test] =
  806:         rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp1}]),
  807:     [test] =
  808:         rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, registered_names, [{group, nc1}]),
  809:     [] = rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cpx}]),
  810:     [] = rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, registered_names, [{group, nc2}]),
  811:     Pid1 = rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{group,nc1}, test,
  812: 					      {io, from_cp1}]),
  813:     {badarg,{test,{io,from_cpx}}} =
  814: 	rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, send, [{group,nc2}, test, {io, from_cpx}]),
  815:     {badarg,{test,{io,from_cpx}}} =
  816: 	rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{group,nc2}, test, {io, from_cpx}]),
  817: 
  818: 
  819: 
  820:     %% test that it is registered at all nodes
  821:     Pid1 = rpc:call(Cp1, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  822:     Pid1 = rpc:call(Cp2, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  823:     Pid1 = rpc:call(Cp3, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  824:     undefined = rpc:call(Cpx, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  825:     undefined = rpc:call(Cpy, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  826:     undefined = rpc:call(Cpz, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  827: 
  828:     %% start a proc and register it
  829:     {PidX, yes} = rpc:call(Cpx, ?MODULE, start_proc, [test]),
  830: 
  831:     %% test that it is registered at all nodes
  832:     Pid1 = rpc:call(Cp1, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  833:     Pid1 = rpc:call(Cp2, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  834:     Pid1 = rpc:call(Cp3, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  835:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpx, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  836:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpy, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  837:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpz, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  838: 
  839:     Pid1 ! die,
  840:     %% If we don't wait for global on other nodes to have updated its
  841:     %% tables, 'test' may still be defined at the point when it is
  842:     %% tested a few lines below.
  843:     ?UNTIL(begin
  844:                Pid = rpc:call(Cp2, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  845:                undefined =:= Pid
  846:            end),
  847: 
  848:     %% start a proc and register it
  849:     {Pid2, yes} = rpc:call(Cp2, ?MODULE, start_proc, [test2]),
  850: 
  851:     %% test that it is registered at all nodes
  852:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp1, global, whereis_name, [test2]),
  853:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp2, global, whereis_name, [test2]),
  854:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp3, global, whereis_name, [test2]),
  855:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpx, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  856:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpy, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  857:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpz, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  858: 
  859:     undefined = rpc:call(Cp1, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  860:     undefined = rpc:call(Cp2, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  861:     undefined = rpc:call(Cp3, global, whereis_name, [test]),
  862:     undefined = rpc:call(Cpx, global, whereis_name, [test2]),
  863:     undefined = rpc:call(Cpy, global, whereis_name, [test2]),
  864:     undefined = rpc:call(Cpz, global, whereis_name, [test2]),
  865: 
  866: 
  867:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, send, [test2, {ping, self()}]),
  868:     receive
  869: 	{pong, Cp2} -> ok
  870:     after
  871: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout2)
  872:     end,
  873:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [test2, {ping, self()}]),
  874:     receive
  875: 	{pong, Cp2} -> ok
  876:     after
  877: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout2)
  878:     end,
  879:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, send, [test2, {ping, self()}]),
  880:     receive
  881: 	{pong, Cp2} -> ok
  882:     after
  883: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout2)
  884:     end,
  885: 
  886:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [test, {ping, self()}]),
  887:     receive
  888: 	{pong, Cpx} -> ok
  889:     after
  890: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout2)
  891:     end,
  892:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpy, global_group, send, [test, {ping, self()}]),
  893:     receive
  894: 	{pong, Cpx} -> ok
  895:     after
  896: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout2)
  897:     end,
  898:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpz, global_group, send, [test, {ping, self()}]),
  899:     receive
  900: 	{pong, Cpx} -> ok
  901:     after
  902: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout2)
  903:     end,
  904: 
  905:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cp1}, test2,
  906: 					      {ping, self()}]),
  907:     receive
  908: 	{pong, Cp2} -> ok
  909:     after
  910: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout2)
  911:     end,
  912:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cpy, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2,
  913: 					      {ping, self()}]),
  914:     receive
  915: 	{pong, Cp2} -> ok
  916:     after
  917: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout2)
  918:     end,
  919:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cpz, global_group, send, [{node, Cp3}, test2,
  920: 					      {ping, self()}]),
  921:     receive
  922: 	{pong, Cp2} -> ok
  923:     after
  924: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout2)
  925:     end,
  926: 
  927:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpz}, test,
  928: 					      {ping, self()}]),
  929:     receive
  930: 	{pong, Cpx} -> ok
  931:     after
  932: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout2)
  933:     end,
  934:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpy, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test,
  935: 					      {ping, self()}]),
  936:     receive
  937: 	{pong, Cpx} -> ok
  938:     after
  939: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout2)
  940:     end,
  941:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpz, global_group, send, [{node, Cpy}, test,
  942: 					      {ping, self()}]),
  943:     receive
  944: 	{pong, Cpx} -> ok
  945:     after
  946: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout2)
  947:     end,
  948: 
  949:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{group, nc1}, test2,
  950: 					      {ping, self()}]),
  951:     receive
  952: 	{pong, Cp2} -> ok
  953:     after
  954: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout2)
  955:     end,
  956:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpy, global_group, send, [{group, nc2}, test,
  957: 					      {ping, self()}]),
  958:     receive
  959: 	{pong, Cpx} -> ok
  960:     after
  961: 	2000 -> ct:fail(timeout2)
  962:     end,
  963: 
  964:     %%------------------------------------
  965:     %% Test monitor nodes
  966:     %%------------------------------------
  967:     Pid2 =
  968:         rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2, monitor]),
  969:     PidX =
  970:         rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test, monitor]),
  971: 
  972: 
  973:     %% Kill node Cp1
  974:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2,
  975: 					      {wait_nodedown, Cp1}]),
  976:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test,
  977: 					      {wait_nodedown, Cp1}]),
  978:     ct:sleep(100),
  979:     peer:stop(Peer1),
  980:     ct:sleep(1000),
  981: 
  982:     ok = assert_loop(Cp2, Cp2, test2, Pid2, loop),
  983:     ok = assert_loop(Cpx, Cpx, test, PidX, loop_nodedown),
  984:     PidX =
  985: 	rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test, to_loop]),
  986: 
  987:     %% Kill node Cpz
  988:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2,
  989: 					      {wait_nodedown, Cpz}]),
  990:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test,
  991: 					      {wait_nodedown, Cpz}]),
  992:     ct:sleep(100),
  993:     peer:stop(Peerz),
  994:     ct:sleep(1000),
  995: 
  996:     ok = assert_loop(Cp2, Cp2, test2, Pid2, loop_nodedown),
  997:     ok = assert_loop(Cpx, Cpx, test, PidX, loop),
  998:     Pid2 =
  999: 	rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2, to_loop]),
 1000: 
 1001:     %% Restart node Cp1
 1002:     Nodes1 = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, own_nodes, []),
 1003:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2,
 1004: 					      {wait_nodeup, Cp1}]),
 1005:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test,
 1006: 					      {wait_nodeup, Cp1}]),
 1007:     ct:sleep(100),
 1008:     {ok, Peer11, Cp1} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Cp1, args => Args}),
 1009:     ct:sleep(5000),
 1010: 
 1011:     ok = assert_loop(Cp2, Cp2, test2, Pid2, loop),
 1012:     ok = assert_loop(Cpx, Cpx, test, PidX, loop_nodeup),
 1013:     PidX =
 1014: 	rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test, to_loop]),
 1015: 
 1016: 
 1017:     %% Restart node Cpz
 1018:     Pid2 = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2,
 1019: 					      {wait_nodeup, Cpz}]),
 1020:     PidX = rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, send, [{node, Cpx}, test,
 1021: 					      {wait_nodeup, Cpz}]),
 1022:     ct:sleep(100),
 1023:     {ok, Peer1z, Cpz} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Cpz, args => Args}),
 1024:     ct:sleep(5000),
 1025: 
 1026:     ok = assert_loop(Cp2, Cp2, test2, Pid2, loop_nodeup),
 1027:     ok = assert_loop(Cpx, Cpx, test, PidX, loop),
 1028:     Pid2 =
 1029: 	rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, send, [{node, Cp2}, test2, to_loop]),
 1030: 
 1031: 
 1032:     Pid2 ! die,
 1033:     PidX ! die,
 1034: 
 1035:     peer:stop(Peer11),
 1036:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 1037:     peer:stop(Peer3),
 1038:     peer:stop(Peerx),
 1039:     peer:stop(Peery),
 1040:     peer:stop(Peer1z),
 1041: 
 1042:     ok.
 1043: 
 1044: 
 1045: 
 1046: %% Test hidden global groups.
 1047: hidden_groups(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1048:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1049:     File = filename:join(Dir, "hidden_groups.config"),
 1050:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [write]),
 1051: 
 1052:     [Ncp1,Ncp2,Ncp3,Ncpx,Ncpy,Ncpz,Ncpq] = [?CT_PEER_NAME() ||
 1053:         _ <- [cp1,cp2,cp3,cpx,cpy,cpz,cpq]],
 1054:     config_hidden(Fd, Ncp1, Ncp2, Ncp3, Ncpx, Ncpy, Ncpz, Ncpq),
 1055: 
 1056:     Args = ["-config", filename:join(Dir, "hidden_groups")],
 1057:     {ok, Peer1, Cp1} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncp1, args => Args}),
 1058:     {ok, Peer2, Cp2} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncp2, args => Args}),
 1059:     {ok, Peer3, Cp3} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncp3, args => Args}),
 1060:     {ok, Peerx, Cpx} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncpx, args => Args}),
 1061:     {ok, Peery, Cpy} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncpy, args => Args}),
 1062:     {ok, Peerz, Cpz} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncpz, args => Args}),
 1063:     {ok, Peerq, Cpq} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Ncpq, args => Args}),
 1064: 
 1065:     %% sleep a while to make the global_groups to sync...
 1066:     ct:sleep(1000),
 1067: 
 1068:     %% check the global group names
 1069:     {nc1, [nc2, nc3]} = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, global_groups, []),
 1070:     {nc1, [nc2, nc3]} = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, global_groups, []),
 1071:     {nc1, [nc2, nc3]} = rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, global_groups, []),
 1072:     {nc2, [nc1, nc3]} = rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, global_groups, []),
 1073:     {nc2, [nc1, nc3]} = rpc:call(Cpy, global_group, global_groups, []),
 1074:     {nc2, [nc1, nc3]} = rpc:call(Cpz, global_group, global_groups, []),
 1075: 
 1076:     %% check the global group nodes
 1077:     Nodes1 = lists:sort([Cp1, Cp2, Cp3]),
 1078:     Nodes2 = lists:sort([Cpx, Cpy, Cpz]),
 1079:     Nodes1 = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, own_nodes, []),
 1080:     Nodes1 = rpc:call(Cp2, global_group, own_nodes, []),
 1081:     Nodes1 = rpc:call(Cp3, global_group, own_nodes, []),
 1082:     Nodes2 = rpc:call(Cpx, global_group, own_nodes, []),
 1083:     Nodes2 = rpc:call(Cpy, global_group, own_nodes, []),
 1084:     Nodes2 = rpc:call(Cpz, global_group, own_nodes, []),
 1085:     [Cpq]           = rpc:call(Cpq, global_group, own_nodes, []),
 1086: 
 1087:     %% Make some inter group connections
 1088:     pong = rpc:call(Cp1, net_adm, ping, [Cpx]),
 1089:     pong = rpc:call(Cpy, net_adm, ping, [Cp2]),
 1090:     pong = rpc:call(Cp3, net_adm, ping, [Cpx]),
 1091:     pong = rpc:call(Cpz, net_adm, ping, [Cp3]),
 1092:     pong = rpc:call(Cpq, net_adm, ping, [Cp1]),
 1093:     pong = rpc:call(Cpz, net_adm, ping, [Cpq]),
 1094: 
 1095:     %% Check that no inter group connections are visible
 1096:     Nodes1 = lists:sort([Cp1|rpc:call(Cp1, erlang, nodes, [])]),
 1097:     Nodes1 = lists:sort([Cp2|rpc:call(Cp2, erlang, nodes, [])]),
 1098:     Nodes1 = lists:sort([Cp3|rpc:call(Cp3, erlang, nodes, [])]),
 1099:     Nodes2 = lists:sort([Cpx|rpc:call(Cpx, erlang, nodes, [])]),
 1100:     Nodes2 = lists:sort([Cpy|rpc:call(Cpy, erlang, nodes, [])]),
 1101:     Nodes2 = lists:sort([Cpz|rpc:call(Cpz, erlang, nodes, [])]),
 1102:     NC12Nodes = lists:append(Nodes1, Nodes2),
 1103:     false = lists:any(fun(N) -> lists:member(N, NC12Nodes) end,
 1104: 		      rpc:call(Cpq, erlang, nodes, [])),
 1105: 
 1106: 
 1107:     peer:stop(Peer1),
 1108:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 1109:     peer:stop(Peer3),
 1110:     peer:stop(Peerx),
 1111:     peer:stop(Peery),
 1112:     peer:stop(Peerz),
 1113:     peer:stop(Peerq),
 1114: 
 1115:     ok.
 1116: 
 1117: 
 1118: %% Checks when the search process exits. .
 1119: test_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1120:     Dir=proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1121:     Args = ["-config", filename:join(Dir, "global_group")],
 1122: 
 1123:     {ok, Peer1, Cp1} = ?CT_PEER(Args),
 1124:     {ok, Peer2, _Cp2} = ?CT_PEER(Args),
 1125:     {ok, Peer3, _Cp3} = ?CT_PEER(Args),
 1126: 
 1127:     ct:sleep(1000),
 1128: 
 1129:     {error, illegal_function_call} =
 1130:         rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, registered_names_test, [{node, Cp1}]),
 1131:     {badarg,_} =
 1132:         rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, send, [king, "The message"]),
 1133:     undefined = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, whereis_name, [king]),
 1134: 
 1135:     % make sure the search process really exits after every global_group operations
 1136:     ProcessCount0 = rpc:call(Cp1, erlang, system_info, [process_count]),
 1137:     _ = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, whereis_name, [{node, Cp1}, whatever_pid_name]),
 1138:     ProcessCount1 = rpc:call(Cp1, erlang, system_info, [process_count]),
 1139:     _ = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, registered_names, [{node, Cp1}]),
 1140:     ProcessCount2 = rpc:call(Cp1, erlang, system_info, [process_count]),
 1141:     _ = rpc:call(Cp1, global_group, send, [{node, Cp1}, whatever_pid_name, msg]),
 1142:     ProcessCount3 = rpc:call(Cp1, erlang, system_info, [process_count]),
 1143:     ProcessCount0 = ProcessCount1 = ProcessCount2 = ProcessCount3,
 1144: 
 1145:     %% stop the nodes, and make sure names are released.
 1146:     peer:stop(Peer1),
 1147:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 1148:     peer:stop(Peer3),
 1149: 
 1150:     %% sleep to let the nodes die
 1151:     ct:sleep(1000),
 1152: 
 1153:     ok.
 1154: 
 1155: global_disconnect(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1156:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1157: 
 1158:     [NProxy,Ncp1,Ncp2,Ncp3,Ncpx,Ncpy,Ncpz,Nh]
 1159:         = [?CT_PEER_NAME(atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME)++"-"++atom_to_list(NN))
 1160:            || NN <- [proxy,cp1,cp2,cp3,cpx,cpy,cpz,h]],
 1161: 
 1162:     Host = from($@, atom_to_list(node())),
 1163: 
 1164:     WriteConf = fun (File,
 1165:                      [S1, S2, S3],
 1166:                      [NC11, NC12, NC13],
 1167:                      [NC21, NC22, NC23]) ->
 1168:                         {ok, Fd} = file:open(filename:join(Dir, File), [write]),
 1169:                         io:format(Fd,
 1170:                                   "[{kernel,~n"
 1171:                                   "  [~n"
 1172:                                   "   {sync_nodes_optional, ['~s@~s','~s@~s','~s@~s']},~n"
 1173:                                   "   {sync_nodes_timeout, 1000},~n"
 1174:                                   "   {global_groups,~n"
 1175:                                   "    [{nc1, ['~s@~s','~s@~s','~s@~s']},~n"
 1176:                                   "     {nc2, ['~s@~s','~s@~s','~s@~s']}]}~n"
 1177:                                   "  ]~n"
 1178:                                   " }].~n",
 1179:                                   [S1, Host, S2, Host, S3, Host,
 1180:                                    NC11, Host, NC12, Host, NC13, Host,
 1181:                                    NC21, Host, NC22, Host, NC23, Host]),
 1182:                         file:close(Fd)
 1183:                 end,
 1184: 
 1185:     WriteConf("nc1.config", [Ncp1,Ncp2,Ncp3], [Ncp1,Ncp2,Ncp3], [Ncpx,Ncpy,Ncpz]),
 1186:     WriteConf("nc2.config", [Ncpx,Ncpy,Ncpz], [Ncp1,Ncp2,Ncp3], [Ncpx,Ncpy,Ncpz]),
 1187: 
 1188:     NC1Args = ["-config", filename:join(Dir, "nc1")],
 1189:     NC2Args = ["-config", filename:join(Dir, "nc2")],
 1190: 
 1191:     PeerNodes = lists:map(fun ({Name, Args}) ->
 1192:                                   ?CT_PEER(#{name => Name,
 1193:                                              args => Args,
 1194:                                              connection => 0})
 1195:                           end,
 1196:                           [{Ncp1, NC1Args},
 1197:                            {Ncp2, NC1Args},
 1198:                            {Ncp3, NC1Args},
 1199:                            {Ncpx, NC2Args},
 1200:                            {Ncpy, NC2Args},
 1201:                            {Ncpz, NC2Args},
 1202:                            {Nh, ["-hidden"]},
 1203:                            {NProxy, ["-hidden"]}]),
 1204: 
 1205:     [{ok, _, Cp1}, {ok, _, Cp2}, {ok, _, Cp3},
 1206:      {ok, _, Cpx}, {ok, _, Cpy}, {ok, _, Cpz},
 1207:      {ok, _, H}, {ok, _, P}] = PeerNodes,
 1208: 
 1209:     %% RPC() - An rpc via a hidden proxy node...
 1210:     RPC = fun (N, M, F, A) ->
 1211:                   erpc:call(P, erpc, call, [N, M, F, A])
 1212:           end,
 1213: 
 1214:     %% The groups
 1215:     NC1Nodes = lists:sort([Cp1, Cp2, Cp3]),
 1216:     NC2Nodes = lists:sort([Cpx, Cpy, Cpz]),
 1217: 
 1218:     %% Wait with disconnect from group nodes a while, so we
 1219:     %% don't have any ongoing communication that brings up
 1220:     %% the connections again...
 1221:     receive after 500 -> ok end,
 1222: 
 1223:     %% Disconnect test_server from the global group nodes...
 1224:     lists:foreach(fun (N) -> erlang:disconnect_node(N) end, NC1Nodes++NC2Nodes),
 1225: 
 1226:     %% wait some more to ensure that global group nodes have synced...
 1227:     receive after 500 -> ok end,
 1228: 
 1229:     %% check the global group names
 1230:     {nc1, [nc2]} = RPC(Cp1, global_group, global_groups, []),
 1231:     {nc1, [nc2]} = RPC(Cp2, global_group, global_groups, []),
 1232:     {nc1, [nc2]} = RPC(Cp3, global_group, global_groups, []),
 1233:     {nc2, [nc1]} = RPC(Cpx, global_group, global_groups, []),
 1234:     {nc2, [nc1]} = RPC(Cpy, global_group, global_groups, []),
 1235:     {nc2, [nc1]} = RPC(Cpz, global_group, global_groups, []),
 1236: 
 1237:     %% check the global group nodes
 1238:     NC1Nodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cp1, global_group, own_nodes, [])),
 1239:     NC1Nodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cp2, global_group, own_nodes, [])),
 1240:     NC1Nodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cp3, global_group, own_nodes, [])),
 1241:     NC2Nodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cpx, global_group, own_nodes, [])),
 1242:     NC2Nodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cpy, global_group, own_nodes, [])),
 1243:     NC2Nodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cpz, global_group, own_nodes, [])),
 1244: 
 1245:     %% Set up connections that should *not* be affected
 1246:     %% by our global:disconnect() call made later (this since
 1247:     %% these connections are not internal in the group). One
 1248:     %% hidden and one visible connection. We don't use the
 1249:     %% proxy node for the hidden connection since it will be
 1250:     %% brought up by our erpc calls if it should have been
 1251:     %% taken down.
 1252:     pong = RPC(H, net_adm, ping, [Cp1]),
 1253:     pong = RPC(Cpx, net_adm, ping, [Cp1]),
 1254: 
 1255:     %% Verify that the connections have been set up as
 1256:     %% expected...
 1257:     HiddenNodes = lists:sort([P, H]),
 1258: 
 1259:     Cp1ConnectedNodes = lists:sort([P, H, Cpx, Cp2, Cp3]),
 1260:     Cp1VisibleNodes = Cp1ConnectedNodes -- HiddenNodes,
 1261:     Cp2ConnectedNodes = lists:sort([P, Cp1, Cp3]),
 1262:     Cp2VisibleNodes = Cp2ConnectedNodes -- HiddenNodes,
 1263:     Cp3ConnectedNodes = lists:sort([P, Cp1, Cp2]),
 1264:     Cp3VisibleNodes = Cp3ConnectedNodes -- HiddenNodes,
 1265: 
 1266:     CpxConnectedNodes = lists:sort([P, Cp1, Cpy, Cpz]),
 1267:     CpxVisibleNodes = CpxConnectedNodes -- HiddenNodes,
 1268:     CpyConnectedNodes = lists:sort([P, Cpx, Cpz]),
 1269:     CpyVisibleNodes = CpyConnectedNodes -- HiddenNodes,
 1270:     CpzConnectedNodes = lists:sort([P, Cpx, Cpy]),
 1271:     CpzVisibleNodes = CpzConnectedNodes -- HiddenNodes,
 1272: 
 1273:     Cp1ConnectedNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cp1, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1274:     Cp1VisibleNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cp1, erlang, nodes, [])),
 1275:     Cp2ConnectedNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cp2, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1276:     Cp2VisibleNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cp2, erlang, nodes, [])),
 1277:     Cp3ConnectedNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cp3, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1278:     Cp3VisibleNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cp3, erlang, nodes, [])),
 1279: 
 1280:     CpxConnectedNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cpx, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1281:     CpxVisibleNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cpx, erlang, nodes, [])),
 1282:     CpyConnectedNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cpy, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1283:     CpyVisibleNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cpy, erlang, nodes, [])),
 1284:     CpzConnectedNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cpz, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1285:     CpzVisibleNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cpz, erlang, nodes, [])),
 1286: 
 1287:     %% Expected disconnects made by global on Cp1...
 1288:     Cp1DisconnectNodes = lists:sort([Cp2, Cp3]),
 1289: 
 1290:     %% Perform the global:disconnect() on Cp1...
 1291:     Cp1DisconnectNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cp1, global, disconnect, [])),
 1292: 
 1293:     %% Wait a while giving the other nodes time to react to the disconnects
 1294:     %% before we check that everything is as expected...
 1295:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
 1296: 
 1297:     %% Verify that only the connections Cp1-Cp2 and Cp1-Cp3 were
 1298:     %% taken down...
 1299:     Cp1PostConnectedNodes = Cp1ConnectedNodes -- Cp1DisconnectNodes,
 1300:     Cp1PostVisibleNodes = Cp1PostConnectedNodes -- HiddenNodes,
 1301:     Cp2PostConnectedNodes = Cp2ConnectedNodes -- [Cp1],
 1302:     Cp2PostVisibleNodes = Cp2PostConnectedNodes -- HiddenNodes,
 1303:     Cp3PostConnectedNodes = Cp3ConnectedNodes -- [Cp1],
 1304:     Cp3PostVisibleNodes = Cp3PostConnectedNodes -- HiddenNodes,
 1305: 
 1306:     Cp1PostConnectedNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cp1, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1307:     Cp1PostVisibleNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cp1, erlang, nodes, [])),
 1308:     Cp2PostConnectedNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cp2, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1309:     Cp2PostVisibleNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cp2, erlang, nodes, [])),
 1310:     Cp3PostConnectedNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cp3, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1311:     Cp3PostVisibleNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cp3, erlang, nodes, [])),
 1312: 
 1313:     CpxConnectedNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cpx, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1314:     CpxVisibleNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cpx, erlang, nodes, [])),
 1315:     CpyConnectedNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cpy, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1316:     CpyVisibleNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cpy, erlang, nodes, [])),
 1317:     CpzConnectedNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cpz, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 1318:     CpzVisibleNodes = lists:sort(RPC(Cpz, erlang, nodes, [])),
 1319: 
 1320:     lists:foreach(fun ({ok, Peer, _Node}) ->
 1321:                           peer:stop(Peer)
 1322:                   end, PeerNodes),
 1323: 
 1324:     ok.
 1325: 
 1326: %%%%% End of test-cases %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1327: 
 1328: wait_for_ready_net() ->
 1329:     Nodes = lists:sort(?NODES),
 1330:     ?UNTIL(begin
 1331:                lists:all(fun(N) -> Nodes =:= get_known(N) end, Nodes) and
 1332: 		   lists:all(fun(N) ->
 1333: 				     LNs = rpc:call(N, erlang, nodes, []),
 1334: 				     Nodes =:= lists:sort([N | LNs])
 1335: 			     end, Nodes)
 1336:            end).
 1337: 
 1338: get_known(Node) ->
 1339:     Known = gen_server:call({global_name_server,Node}, get_known),
 1340:     lists:sort([Node | Known]).
 1341: 
 1342: config_hidden(Fd, Ncp1, Ncp2, Ncp3, Ncpx, Ncpy, Ncpz, Ncpq) ->
 1343:     M = from($@, atom_to_list(node())),
 1344:     io:format(Fd, "[{kernel, [{sync_nodes_optional, ['~s@~s','~s@~s','~s@~s', "
 1345: 	      " '~s@~s','~s@~s','~s@~s']},"
 1346: 	      "{sync_nodes_timeout, 1000},"
 1347: 	      "{global_groups, [{nc1, hidden, ['~s@~s','~s@~s','~s@~s']}, "
 1348: 	      "{nc2, hidden, ['~s@~s','~s@~s','~s@~s']}, "
 1349: 	      "{nc3, normal, ['~s@~s']}]} ] }]. ~n",
 1350: 	      [Ncp1, M, Ncp2, M, Ncp3, M,
 1351:                Ncpx, M, Ncpy, M, Ncpz, M,
 1352:                Ncp1, M, Ncp2, M, Ncp3, M,
 1353:                Ncpx, M, Ncpy, M, Ncpz, M,
 1354:                Ncpq, M]).
 1355: 
 1356: config(Fd, Ncp1, Ncp2, Ncp3, Ncpx, Ncpy, Ncpz, Ncpq) ->
 1357:     M = from($@, atom_to_list(node())),
 1358:     io:format(Fd, "[{kernel, [{sync_nodes_optional, ['~s@~s','~s@~s','~s@~s', "
 1359: 	      " '~s@~s','~s@~s','~s@~s']},"
 1360: 	      "{sync_nodes_timeout, 1000},"
 1361: 	      "{global_groups, [{nc1, ['~s@~s','~s@~s','~s@~s']}, "
 1362: 	      " {nc2, ['~s@~s','~s@~s','~s@~s']}, "
 1363: 	      "{nc3, ['~s@~s']}]} ] }]. ~n",
 1364: 	      [Ncp1, M, Ncp2, M, Ncp3, M,
 1365:                Ncpx, M, Ncpy, M, Ncpz, M,
 1366:                Ncp1, M, Ncp2, M, Ncp3, M,
 1367:                Ncpx, M, Ncpy, M, Ncpz, M,
 1368:                Ncpq, M]).
 1369: 
 1370: config_no(Fd) ->
 1371:     io:format(Fd, "[{kernel, [{global_groups, []}]}]. ~n",[]).
 1372: 
 1373: config_sync(Fd, Ncp1, Ncp2, Ncp3, Ncpx, Ncpy, Ncpz) ->
 1374:     M = from($@, atom_to_list(node())),
 1375:     io:format(Fd, "[{kernel, [{sync_nodes_optional, ['~s@~s','~s@~s','~s@~s', "
 1376: 	      " '~s@~s','~s@~s','~s@~s']},"
 1377: 	      "{sync_nodes_timeout, 1000},"
 1378: 	      "{global_groups, []} ] }] .~n",
 1379: 	      [Ncp1, M, Ncp2, M, Ncp3, M,
 1380:                Ncpx, M, Ncpy, M, Ncpz, M]).
 1381: 
 1382: 
 1383: config_comp(Fd, Ncp1, Ncp2, Ncp3, Ncpx, Ncpy, Ncpz) ->
 1384:     M = from($@, atom_to_list(node())),
 1385:     io:format(Fd, "[{kernel, [{sync_nodes_optional, ['~s@~s','~s@~s','~s@~s', "
 1386: 	      " '~s@~s','~s@~s','~s@~s']},"
 1387: 	      "{sync_nodes_timeout, 1000} ] }] .~n",
 1388: 	      [Ncp1, M, Ncp2, M, Ncp3, M,
 1389:                Ncpx, M, Ncpy, M, Ncpz, M]).
 1390: 
 1391: from(H, [H | T]) -> T;
 1392: from(H, [_ | T]) -> from(H, T);
 1393: from(_, []) -> [].
 1394: 
 1395: 
 1396: start_proc(Name) ->
 1397:     Pid = spawn(?MODULE, init, [self(), Name]),
 1398:     receive
 1399: 	{Pid, Res} -> {Pid, Res}
 1400:     end.
 1401: 
 1402: start_proc_rereg(Name) ->
 1403:     Pid = spawn(?MODULE, init2, [self(), Name]),
 1404:     receive
 1405: 	Pid -> Pid
 1406:     end.
 1407: 
 1408: 
 1409: 
 1410: 
 1411: 
 1412: 
 1413: 
 1414: init(Parent) ->
 1415:     Parent ! self(),
 1416:     loop().
 1417: 
 1418: init(Parent, Name) ->
 1419:     X = global:register_name(Name, self()),
 1420:     Parent ! {self(),X},
 1421:     loop().
 1422: 
 1423: init2(Parent, Name) ->
 1424:     global:re_register_name(Name, self()),
 1425:     Parent ! self(),
 1426:     loop().
 1427: 
 1428: loop() ->
 1429:     receive
 1430: 	monitor ->
 1431: 	    global_group:monitor_nodes(true),
 1432: 	    loop();
 1433: 	stop_monitor ->
 1434: 	    global_group:monitor_nodes(false),
 1435: 	    loop();
 1436: 	{wait_nodeup, Node} ->
 1437: 	    loop_nodeup(Node);
 1438: 	{wait_nodedown, Node} ->
 1439: 	    loop_nodedown(Node);
 1440: 	{io, _Msg} ->
 1441: 	    loop();
 1442: 	{ping, From} ->
 1443: 	    From ! {pong, node()},
 1444: 	    loop();
 1445: 	{del_lock, Id} ->
 1446: 	    global:del_lock({Id, self()}),
 1447: 	    loop();
 1448: 	{del_lock, Id, Nodes} ->
 1449: 	    global:del_lock({Id, self()}, Nodes),
 1450: 	    loop();
 1451: 	{set_lock, Id, From} ->
 1452: 	    Res = global:set_lock({Id, self()}, ?NODES, 1),
 1453: 	    From ! Res,
 1454: 	    loop();
 1455: 	{set_lock, Id, From, Nodes} ->
 1456: 	    Res = global:set_lock({Id, self()}, Nodes, 1),
 1457: 	    From ! Res,
 1458: 	    loop();
 1459: 	{set_lock_loop, Id, From} ->
 1460: 	    global:set_lock({Id, self()}, ?NODES),
 1461: 	    From ! {got_lock, self()},
 1462: 	    loop();
 1463: 	{{got_notify, From}, Ref} ->
 1464: 	    receive
 1465: 		X when element(1, X) == global_name_conflict ->
 1466: 		    From ! {Ref, yes}
 1467: 	    after
 1468: 		0 -> From ! {Ref, no}
 1469: 	    end,
 1470: 	    loop();
 1471: 	{which_loop, From} ->
 1472: 	    From ! loop,
 1473: 	    loop();
 1474: 	die ->
 1475: 	    exit(normal)
 1476:     end.
 1477: 
 1478: 
 1479: loop_nodeup(Node) ->
 1480:     receive
 1481: 	{nodeup, Node} ->
 1482: 	    loop();
 1483: 	to_loop ->
 1484: 	    loop();
 1485: 	{which_loop, From} ->
 1486: 	    From ! loop_nodeup,
 1487: 	    loop_nodeup(Node);
 1488: 	die ->
 1489: 	    exit(normal)
 1490:     end.
 1491: 
 1492: 
 1493: loop_nodedown(Node) ->
 1494:     receive
 1495: 	{nodedown, Node} ->
 1496: 	    loop();
 1497: 	to_loop ->
 1498: 	    loop();
 1499: 	{which_loop, From} ->
 1500: 	    From ! loop_nodedown,
 1501: 	    loop_nodedown(Node);
 1502: 	die ->
 1503: 	    exit(normal)
 1504:     end.
 1505: 
 1506: assert_loop(Cp, CpName, Name, NamePid, Loop) ->
 1507:     M = {which_loop, self()},
 1508:     NamePid = rpc:call(Cp, global_group, send, [{node, CpName}, Name, M]),
 1509:     receive
 1510:         Loop ->
 1511:             ok;
 1512:         Other1 ->
 1513:             ct:fail(Other1)
 1514:     after 5000 ->
 1515:             ct:fail(timeout)
 1516:     end.
 1517: 
 1518: loop_until_true(Fun) ->
 1519:     case Fun() of
 1520: 	true ->
 1521: 	    ok;
 1522: 	_ ->
 1523: 	    loop_until_true(Fun)
 1524:     end.
